Product Marketing Manager

Marketing New York, NY Full-time

ABOUT PLACER.AI

Placer.ai is transforming how organizations understand the physical world. Our location analytics platform provides unprecedented visibility into locations, markets, and consumer behavior. Placer empowers thousands of customers—from Fortune 500 companies to local governments and nonprofits—to make smarter, data-driven decisions.

What sets us apart?

  • Innovation & Privacy: We’ve built the most advanced location intelligence platform while maintaining an uncompromising commitment to privacy.
  • Rapid Growth: We reached $100M in annual recurring revenue within 6 years, achieved unicorn status ($1B+ valuation) in 2022, and continue to expand as one of North America’s fastest-growing tech companies.
  • Recognition: Named one of Forbes America’s Best Startup Employers and a Deloitte Technology Fast 500 company.

THE ROLE

We are seeking a Product Marketing Manager to drive go-to-market strategy and product positioning for our location intelligence platform. You’ll work at the intersection of product, marketing, and sales to ensure our solutions resonate with target audiences and drive business growth.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Go-to-Market Strategy: Develop and execute launch strategies for new products and features
  • Product Positioning: Create compelling messaging and positioning that differentiates our platform
  • Market Research: Conduct competitive analysis and customer research to inform strategy
  • Sales Enablement: Create sales tools, battle cards, and training materials
  • Content Strategy: Develop product-focused content including case studies, whitepapers, and demos
  • Campaign Development: Collaborate with demand generation on targeted marketing campaigns
  • Customer Insights: Gather feedback from customers and prospects to inform product roadmap

REQUIREMENTS

Education: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or related field

Experience:

  • 4+ years of product marketing experience, preferably in B2B SaaS
  • Experience with data analytics or location intelligence platforms is a plus
  • Track record of successful product launches and go-to-market execution

Marketing Skills:

  • Messaging & Positioning: Strong ability to craft compelling product narratives
  • Market Research: Experience with competitive analysis and customer research
  • Content Creation: Excellent writing skills for various marketing materials
  • Campaign Management: Experience with multi-channel marketing campaigns

Technical Understanding:

  • Ability to understand complex technical products and translate to business value
  • Familiarity with data analytics, APIs, and SaaS platforms
  • Experience with marketing automation and CRM systems

Soft Skills:

  • Excellent communication and presentation abilities
  • Strong project management and organizational skills
  • Collaborative approach to cross-functional work
  • Data-driven mindset with analytical thinking

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

  • MBA or advanced marketing degree
  • Experience in location analytics, retail tech, or real estate technology
  • Background in enterprise software marketing
  • Knowledge of privacy regulations and data governance
  • Experience with product-led growth strategies

WHY JOIN PLACER.AI?

  • Market Leadership: Help shape the narrative for an emerging and growing market
  • Product Impact: Work with cutting-edge location intelligence technology
  • Growth Opportunity: Join a rapidly scaling marketing organization
  • Cross-functional Exposure: Collaborate closely with product, sales, and executive teams
  • Competitive Package: Strong compensation, equity, and comprehensive benefits

NOTEWORTHY LINKS

  • Placer.ai’s $100M Round C Funding
  • The Anchor (Data in Action)
  • Placer.ai in the News
  • Video: Placer for Commercial Real Estate

Equal Opportunity Employer: Placer.ai is an equal opportunity employer with a global remote workforce. We are committed to a drug-free workplace and providing reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities.
